meanings.definition: A television series that presents factual information in a documentary style.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching a docuseries about animals on TV.
meanings.sent2: The docuseries on climate change was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent3: The docuseries on penguins made me laugh with their funny antics.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a docuseries, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The docuseries on space exploration was so captivating, it felt like I was floating among the stars.

meanings.definition: A series of documentary films or episodes.
meanings.sent1: The docuseries on history covered various important events.
meanings.sent2: We watched a fascinating docuseries on ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The docuseries on cooking had me craving all kinds of food.
meanings.sent4: His journey felt like a thrilling docuseries with each chapter revealing more.
meanings.sent5: The docuseries on nature was so beautifully filmed, it felt like stepping into a painting.
